attributes.additional_details: If you want to save animals this is one way to do it. Glitter is ,as I said before, really bad for the environment so if you want to make a difference sign this petition.
attributes.background: Glitter is bad for the environment because it isn't biodegradable and therefore animals could eat it and die .

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition calling for Parliament to make it illegal to sell glitter that isn't biodegradable, if that's what you'd like to happen.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
